statements: DELETE FROM knowledge_base WHERE solution_title = 'Example Solution';
DELETE FROM knowledge_base WHERE agent_category = 'Technical Support';
DELETE FROM knowledge_base WHERE solution_title LIKE 'Data%'
DELETE FROM best_practices WHERE practice_id IN (SELECT practice_id FROM solutions WHERE solution_id = 1);
DELETE FROM best_practices WHERE practice_id NOT IN (SELECT practice_id FROM solutions);
DELETE FROM solutions WHERE id = 1 AND category = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM agents WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'johndoe@example.com';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE agent_id = 2 AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM agents WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
